Sentencas: Dry reforming of liquid alcohols coupled with solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is a promising approach for clean and efficient energy conversion.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: Herein, the feasibility of power generation from flat-tube SOFCs with direct internal dry reforming of methanol has been studied.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: The effects of CO2/MeOH ratio, temperature, and current density on cell performance and long-term durability were investigated.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: Higher CO2/MeOH ratios reduced the power density, but suppressed carbon deposition and enhanced long-term durability.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: A cell was operated stably over 500 h with a constant current density of 200 mA/cm2 under CO2/MeOH =1 and 2 at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: In addition to stable power generation, simultaneous syngas production and reduction in CO2 emissions were achieved.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: Density functional theory (DFT) calculations elucidated the possible pathways for methanol dry reforming and mechanism of carbon removal.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels

Sentencas: Our experimental and simulation results provide insights into the direct utilization of methanol in SOFCs using dry reforming.
Titulo: Power generation from flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells by direct internal dry reforming of methanol: A route for simultaneous utilization of CO2 and biofuels
